name: 7th International Conference on Augmented Reality, Virtual Reality and Computer Graphics (SALENTO AVR 2020)
content: SALENTO AVR 2020 intends to bring together the community of researchers and scientists in order to discuss key issues, approaches, ideas, open problems, innovative applications and trends on virtual and augmented reality, 3D visualization and computer graphics in the areas of medicine, cultural heritage, arts, education, entertainment, military and industrial applications.
